card.name: Drive a Hard Bargain
card.text: Haggle (As an additional cost to cast this, you may pay {1}. This spell was haggled for if you do or if you spent mana from a Treasure to cast it.) Draw two cards. Then discard a card if this spell wasn't haggled for.

card.name: Outer-Sea Tyrant
card.text: As Outer-Sea Tyrant enters the battlefield, target opponent chooses a number between 1 and 10. Outer-Sea Tyrant enters the battlefield tapped with that many stun counters on it and you create that many tapped Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Rushwood Scavenger
card.text: When Rushwood Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may exile two cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Cateran Negotiation
card.text: Haggle (As an additional cost to cast this, you may pay {1}. This spell was haggled for if you do or if you spent mana from a Treasure to cast it.) Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If this spell was haggled for, that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Flight from Privilege
card.text: Haggle (As an additional cost to cast this, you may pay {1}. This spell was haggled for if you do or if you spent mana from a Treasure to cast it.) Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards. If this spell was haggled for, instead you may play those cards until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Hellkite Whelp
card.text: Whenever you discard one or more cards, put a +1/+1 counter on Hellkite Whelp. Hellkite Whelp has flying as long as it has two or more counters on it.

card.name: Saprazzan Scion
card.text: When Saprazzan Scion enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Cho-Arrim Connection
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. • You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Cold-Blooded Cartographer
card.text: Haggle (As an additional cost to cast this, you may pay {1}. This spell was haggled for if you do or if you spent mana from a Treasure to cast it.) When Cold-Blooded Cartographer enters the battlefield, if it was haggled for, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Kyren Courier
card.text: Flying When Kyren Courier dies or when you discard it, create a tapped Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Rishadan Abacus
card.text: When this artifact enters, create a tapped Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Lamprey Hydra
card.text: Vigilance, trample Lamprey Hydra enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of mana you've spent this turn.

card.name: Hand of the Market
card.text: Flying Whenever Hand of the Market or a token enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Singular Sculptor
card.text: When Singular Sculptor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is an artifact, it gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Wanted Hustler
card.text: When Wanted Hustler dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Clock Tower
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped artifact or creature you control: Add {C}. {3}{U}, Discard Clock Tower: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Barter with Fate
card.text: Haggle (As an additional cost to cast this, you may pay {1}. This spell was haggled for if you do or if you spent mana from a Treasure to cast it.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If this spell was haggled for, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.

card.name: Overwhelmed Adjudicator
card.text: When Overwhelmed Adjudicator enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card unless you've discarded a card this turn.

card.name: Stern Redistributor
card.text: Whenever Stern Redistributor deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Ramosian Banner
card.text: When Ramosian Banner enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards. Sacrifice Ramosian Banner: Target creature gains menace and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Prizefight
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Deepwood Gnarlbark
card.text: Reach Deepwood Gnarlbark gets +1/+1 as long as you've spent five or more mana this turn.

card.name: Blade of Ramos
card.text: Blade of Ramos has menace as long as you've discarded a card this turn.

card.name: Work to the Bone
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw two cards. Excise 2 (You may cast this from your graveyard by exiling any number of other cards from your graveyard with two or more card types between them in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Alchemical Shyster
card.text: When Alchemical Shyster enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

card.name: Arabeka's Handmaid
card.text: Whenever Arabeka's Handmaid attacks, you may discard a card. When you do, draw a card and up to one target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Extortion Patrol
card.text: If one or more tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus an additional Treasure token are created instead. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Deepwood Shade
card.text: Whenever you tap a nonland permanent for mana, add an additional {B} or {G}. {2}: Deepwood Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Soul of the Henge
card.text: When Soul of the Henge enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token, then you may discard a card. If do you, search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Aven Appraiser
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Henge Supplicant
card.text: When Henge Supplicant enters the battlefield, create a tapped Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lost in the Bustle
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains your choice of flying or first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Imp Wrangler
card.text: When Imp Wrangler enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. When you do, destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Imp Wrangler.

card.name: Sage of Iachem-oath
card.text: Flying Sage of Iachem-oath enters the battlefield tapped unless you've discarded a card this turn.

card.name: Saprazzan Sylph
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Deregulation
card.text: Haggle (As an additional cost to cast this, you may pay {1}. This spell was haggled for if you do or if you spent mana from a Treasure to cast it.) If this spell was haggled for, players can't gain life this turn and damage can't be prevented this turn. Deregulation deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Cho-Arrim Entrancer
card.text: {1}{G}: Cho-Arrim Entrancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate if mana from a nonland source is used to activate it.

card.name: Laissez Faire
card.text: Haggle (As an additional cost to cast this, you may pay {1}. This spell was haggled for if you do or if you spent mana from a Treasure to cast it.) Target opponent discards a card. If this spell was haggled for, instead that player reveals their hand, you choose a nonland card from it, then that player discards that card.

card.name: Cateran Guilt
card.text: When Cateran Guilt enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Cateran Guilt leaves the battlefield. Then if that permanent's controllers controls more lands than you, create a tapped Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Blacksmith's Guardian
card.text: Vigilance As long as you control three or more artifacts, Blacksmith's Guardian gets +2/+0 and has flying.

card.name: Hydraulic Haulier
card.text: Deathtouch When Hydraulic Haulier enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Pilfering Harpy
card.text: Flying When Pilfering Harpy enters the battlefield, return target instant, sorcery, or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mox Nacre
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Foreseen Storm
card.text: Destroy all artifacts and creatures.

card.name: Entrepreneurial Intent
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
